content: Pinaki Sankar Chatterjee - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Pinaki Sankar Chatterjee Pinaki Sankar Chatterjee Pinaki Sankar Chatterjee Associate ProfessorPinaki Sankar Chatterjee received his B.Tech degree in Information Technology from B.P.U.T, Orissa, India, his M.Tech degree in Computer Science from IIT Kharagpur, West Bengal, India, and his PhD degree in Computer Science from KIIT Deemed-to-be University Bhubaneswar, India. He is a member of IET and Indian Science Congress. He has published numbers of research papers in peer-reviewed international journals and conferences. His areas of interest include WSN, CWSN, NLP, IoT.
